storyInfo: Spuria has modified Fortuna's gun according to her wishes. The gun, meant to bring joy, is fired for the first time in a moment of sorrow.

attributes.content: May 1099
Ecclesia Requietum, Laterano
Oh, these explosives you brought aren't half bad! If the poor old soul in the coffin could still hear, I'm sure he'd love them!
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: Really? I sure hope so. I heard he participated in a demolition race at the nursing home just the week before he passed away. I think he'd love them!
attributes.name: Reserved Lateran

attributes.content: No way, are there seriously this many people out here for a funeral?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I expected a happier response when you saw me, you know?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: It's just that... I noticed this place is really far from the city center.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Well, it's our old teacher's funeral. Since Fiammetta and Mostima are out of town at the moment, I have no choice but to make an appearance on their behalf.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: How about you? Is this a business trip?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Well, the folks in the nursing home who are too infirm to make it here have requested a live broadcast of the funeral. This is where my department comes in.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Sounds like you're getting the hang of your job at Curia.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Well, of course. I'm doing my best to catch up to you.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm not your teacher, Lia. I can't grade your work, you know.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: *sigh* Sometimes I really wish we didn't have these halos.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Though I doubt you'd miss my presence even without them.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Hey, I remember you!
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: Me?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Our teacher once showed us your assignment for a new explosive design!
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: *sigh* I'm surprised it wasn't about how you were caught breaking the rules.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Ah, that was mostly Fiammetta's work.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Come to think of it, our teacher was already close to a hundred years old when he taught us. Yet, he was still so spirited, and his voice was so clear.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Absolutely. He only retired two years ago. After all, he was really into studying explosives.
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: Well, that and the fact that his favorite dessert place was close to the school. He didn't need anyone's permission to indulge.
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: He wrote in his will that he had no regrets, but I still think about how he'll never be able to have those seasonal cactus tarts again.
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: You're making a lump grow in my throat.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Haha, I'm sorry... This is our teacher's sacred moment, yet I am talking about cactus tarts.
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: Time to pull out the safety pins!
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: Every funeral needs an explosion or three!
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: I'm going to fire off some three-shot bursts over in the field!
attributes.name: Friendly Lateran

attributes.content: I'd better go make sure things don't get out of hand.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Not in the mood to chat, Lia?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I heard that while I was hospitalized, you pestered El for my room number for a year.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: *sigh* You're real scary, you know that?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm just worried about you. No need to be so shy; I'm not exactly your senior anymore.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: While I was asleep, you should've gone outside and experienced as much as you could.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Did you ever even poke your head outside the door, Lia? Have you made sure your tech is widely used?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: As sly as ever, Lemuen. You know I'm the one who wants to ask you that.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Maybe I have.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: January 1100
A house on Via Canelé, Laterano

Now, I'm considered a long-term field operator, the type who doesn't stick around the Curia longer than necessary. Not really sure if I'm cut out to help with the restoration work at Sanctilaminium Ambrosii.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: If there's nothing else, I'll be hanging up. I've got things to do.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: The familiar smell of Originium explosives and the sound of explosion tests...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: This is just like the old days when I'd skip classes and come here
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Whenever I recall everything that happened in that monastery, the memory barely feels real.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: No wonder the history buffs are always talking about the 'eternal paradise.'
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Scary stuff.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Hey, is nobody in? The welcome sign is hung up and all...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Oh, don't be such a spoilsport! Did you really have to short-circuit my little doohickey?
Color me surprised, Magistra Amalie. Do you greet all your customers like this?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I was just shooting butter. If you were quick enough, you could have caught it with your mouth.
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: I'm a gunsmith, not a beckbeast for you to train.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Hehe. Come on in, Serpilia, have a seat. So what brings you here?
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: I've got a gun that needs some modifications.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Oh, an antique, I see.
attributes.name: Gunsmith
Serpilia
attributes.content: The owner...

attributes.name: Serpilia
attributes.content: isn't a Sankta.
The owner wanted to use the gun, but it ended up misfiring.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: The gun's very important to her, so I told her she could keep it.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: But naturally, that'll have to wait until I'm done modding it.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Ah, but making a gun usable by a non-Sankta can be a tough nut to crack.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Lucky for you, I'm already dealing with a misfired gun from another customer.
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: You can take a look at it first, for inspiration.
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: Isn't this just an ordinary gun?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: But fine, I'll help you out. We've known each other long enough for that.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Oh right, I heard you got promoted from the district office to the Curia?
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: I can't believe this. Don't you care about your friends at all?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I take it that's a no?
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: I did join the Curia, but I've resigned just recently.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: It wasn't approved, but I got appointed as a long-term field operator. At least I don't have to listen to my boss prattle away in the office anymore.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I've been saying this whole time that being a gunsmith suits you best, Serpilia. Did you cause trouble again?
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: I suppose I did.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Sheesh! And I thought I already had my share of trouble during the years at the district office!
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: As it turns out, I'm still not a good enough gunsmith for them.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What a shame. And here I was hoping you could bring me some bullet biscuits from the Curia gift shop so I didn't have to order takeout.
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: Anyway, I must say I really fancy those inventions you used to tease the kids in the office with.
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: Oh, looks like the gun's owner is here.
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: Hello.
attributes.name: Sankta Customer

attributes.content: Ma'am, you can't expect your gun to function well when you don't maintain it. Look, the sear's all worn out. We'll need to replace it.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: It also needs another layer of safety.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm really sorry for all the trouble. Still, my daughter's only three. I don't think those things are what she really wants.
attributes.name: Sankta Customer

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: She messed with the gun behind my back and got it misfired, but what she really wanted was that toy gun from the store that shoots rainbow candy.
attributes.name: Sankta Customer

attributes.content: So, I hope you can modify this gun into something she would like. It will be her present when she is discharged from the hospital.
attributes.name: Sankta Customer

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry. Both my husband and daughter are fine.
attributes.name: Sankta Customer

attributes.content: That's great... but you should count yourselves lucky.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Magistra Amalie, why didn't you tell me what the customer wanted just now?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Ha, didn't you hide that from me too?
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: Why would a non-Sankta insist on using a gun? Isn't it rather strange?
attributes.name: Gunsmith

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Come to think of it, I should probably ask her directly.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Phew, it's so chilly... We need to get this windshield up real quick.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Could you lend me a hand, Parker?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Parker?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Tsk.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Don't waste your time on that guy.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Is he purposely ignoring me?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: He won't answer no matter who's calling for him, because you suggested that name.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: I'll surely teach him a lesson when we're out hunting tomorrow.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Don't be like that, Raimund. I don't want to get into another argument or even resort to violence...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I know. But he'd better start talking nicely to you instead of just glaring at you in silence.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Doesn't he get that you're the one who saved him?!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Oh, having a spat?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: *cough* Good evening, Serpilia.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: We got your letter, but you really didn't need to let us know ahead of time. Not like we could've prepared anyway.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Sorry, I still haven't been able to make that herb pizzelle I promised you.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: It just so happens that I anonymously contacted a caravan. They'll detour here pretty soon to do business with you guys.
attributes.name: Serpilia
Fortuna
attributes.content: A caravan?!

attributes.name: Fortuna
attributes.content: That's amazing, Serpilia! Maybe we'll survive the winter!
We could really use those supplies. Thanks.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: You should hide while they're here, Fortuna. I'll do the talking.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Put a hood on when you're dealing with them. Also, make sure you don't get cheated.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Okay, okay!
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: By the way, Serpilia... There's something I need to apologize to you for.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: You told me not to let too many people see me, especially not other Sarkaz, but...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Let's get inside first, then you can take your time explaining. I promise I won't get mad, okay?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: So, you took that young Sarkaz in.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: *sigh* According to the rules of the Curia, I think that's a violation.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I-I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Well, considering you saved him when he was wounded, I'm sure the Pope will be kind enough to understand.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Also, you said he was originally with a team heading to Kazdel but fell behind due to his injuries. I doubt his team will let him back in.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Sounds to me like settling down here is his only option.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Right. I hope he'll stay.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: And as long as he doesn't start wandering around, no one's going to get wind of a fallen angel living here.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: *sigh* Writing up a report is already a pain. How about I just leave out this particular detail?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Really? That would be wonderful!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: But... are you sure it's okay?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Hard to say. So don't do it again, alright?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Or you could just keep your hood up at all times and never use your gun again. That works too.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Okay. I'll try my best.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I've been learning to use a crossbow, and I've joined in the last few hunts.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: How do you feel?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: It's tough... Oh, I don't mean the crossbow. It's tough having to fend for myself.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Back in the monastery, I always believed that as long as I was devoted to my prayers, I would naturally receive my communion.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Nowadays, I still pray with Sural and the others, but we know that the situation has changed.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Shh—
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: What's wrong?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Nothing, really. Just reminding you not to reveal anything about your identity.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Right. I'll keep that in mind.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: So, been feeling any big changes?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Sure, you've lost your empathy, but there weren't any Sanktas around you to begin with anyway.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Even so, the feeling of losing something has become more and more vivid for me lately.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: It's like, walking around at night. Like I'm blind, and I can't sense anyone else... It's lonely.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I'm going to be trapped in this darkness forever, aren't I?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: ...Ah, sorry. I doubt you need all these for your report.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. I'm always happy to lend an ear.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Look, I still haven't finished modding your gun.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: So, what exactly do you want to do with it, Fortuna?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm still afraid of it.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: But I must hold it. I can't just forget what happened to Fina.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: So...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Just a second, Fortuna. We have a guest.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You can come out from under the window now. My drone has been watching you for a long time.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Oh, no need to be so nervous.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I can tell you're worried that we Sanktas might be plotting something nasty for the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: If so, why not come in and join our discussion? Might as well get out of the cold, right?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: We mean no harm, Parker.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Anyway, back to you, Fortuna. As long as you explain things clearly, we can understand each other even without empathy, right?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I still haven't started modding your gun, you know.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I want to defeat my fear. Find peace again. The feeling I used to have whenever I held my gun.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Ever since I came here, I've been thinking it would be nice to share that feeling with everyone else.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Because... Grandpa Bishop was always able to comfort anyone who came to him.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: But we've already left his side.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Oh, I see you've started working on my gun. Wouldn't my thoughts seem unreasonable?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I can't say the gun will turn out exactly how you're hoping.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: But at least I've got some ideas now. Don't forget to thank me when I'm done.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: *sigh* What time is it now? Man, what time did I finish modding that gun last night?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Serpilia, Serpilia!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Sorry... I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: What happened?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: My gun... It's gone.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Also, Parker's missing too.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Our sentries didn't see him at all last night... Dammit, that guy knows when we change shifts, and we never thought about guarding against one of our own.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Sorry, Serpilia. We'll definitely catch him. We've already got a team preparing to head out.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: There's no rush.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: That gun he took was a weapon I modded. I have a good idea where it's gone.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Have you been keeping an eye on him from the start?
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Feel free to guess whether I've been keeping tabs on Fortuna, to make sure she doesn't run off.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Just kidding. Look, loosen up. You're so tense right now.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Fortuna and I will go after him.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Fine.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: Right, one more thing—
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: As a field operator, the resources I use aren't strictly monitored, but I still have to report any bullets used while supervising a fallen angel. So, I'll go easy on him.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Was that what you wanted to hear?
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...Yeah. Thanks.
attributes.name: Raimund

attributes.content: There are traces of blood here.
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Is this... really the right way, Serpilia?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Your gun's definitely here, anyway.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: You said you had finished your modifications. If I can use it, does it mean Parker can use it too?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: I actually hope he tries.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: That... Whose blood is that?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Ugh... Ha, hahaha.
Isn't this what you want to see, you damned Sankta?! It's my blood!
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: You look in real bad shape.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Parker! Th-Those are...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: ...Wounds from a wild beast attack.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Lord...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Shut up... Get away from me!
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: I'd rather be swallowed by a tuskbeast than die in your trap!
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: Trap? What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: You heard our conversation. We never meant to hurt anyone!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Serpilia even helped us get supplies for the winter!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Sure, but you're just doing all that to trick the other Sarkaz into staying.
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: Why don't they go home? What home can a Sarkaz possibly have but Kazdel?
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: Kazdel... What is it like there? Raimund's never told me about it...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: ...Fortuna.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: I'm afraid people who haven't been to Sanctilaminium Ambrosii will find it hard to understand your way of life.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: But... why can't you just stop overthinking things? What's so bad about staying here and having a roof over your head to make it through the winter?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Stop overthinking things? *cough* *cough* You can't fool me.
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: You bastards with your halos have been spending your lives lying to others and playing the saint...
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: There's no way you don't hate the Sarkaz. You're just waiting for the right opportunity.
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: Hnn... Now, how much does a pair of Sarkaz horns go for these days?
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: I-I don't know! I really don't!
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Looks to me like you stole Fortuna's gun for similar reasons.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: I knew I was gonna die soon, so I figured I'd best take you two down with me.
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: ...Just give it back to us first.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: No! Don't take it!
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: I need a Sankta gun to return to my team... To be respected...
attributes.name: Parker

attributes.content: But I've already modded this gun, it's not even—
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: 'Stealing an antique gun is a serious violation of the law, Serpilia. It's no use saying it's for educational purposes at school.'
'Still, we teachers are rather curious as to what you, a genius who never listens to a word in class, can discover from it.'
'Well, I can easily disassemble the antique gun.'
'After studying the parts in detail, there are only two types of technology involved. One is irrelevant to modern people like us, while the other is the most basic of basics.'
'But Lia, have you tried praying while holding it?'
'Or can you imagine what sort of person once held it to pray, and under what circumstances?'
'At the time, The Holy City had yet to be founded, and the Paradisus didn't exist. Hard to imagine, isn't it?'
'But if you do not understand that ancient era, what can you truly learn from the legacy they left behind?'
Serpilia... why did you... fire the gun all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Serpilia keeps her gun pointed at the empty space outside the cave entrance, and pulls the trigger once more.
Don't be scared. This is just how we Laterans hold a funeral.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Whether it's the sadness of death, the pain of separation, or the feelings of regret and anger...
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: They all fade away in the sound of gunfire.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: There is no gunfire from another Sankta, no chain of explosions, no shrieks of joy or laughter.
As the shots ring out, Fortuna draws a deep breath and takes her gun from Serpilia's hand.
I can guarantee you that the gun's completely safe now.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: If you're still scared, you can close your eyes. I'll look out for you.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: ...I should watch and remember this.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Okay, close your eyes. Point your arm this way.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: This is...
attributes.name: Fortuna

attributes.content: Yeah, this 'gun' can no longer be a trophy.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: It's not a gun anymore.
attributes.name: Serpilia

attributes.content: It can be used without a Sankta's talent, and it lets you share simple joy with others.
Colorful pieces of paper and ribbons spew forth from its barrel, sticking to the hair of the duo.
Its shot echoes through the cave, and the confetti gently rains down around them.
But none of those present smiles.
